task: Enable dynamic theming on results page based on dominant attunement category
description: Update the results page layout to change background color, highlight gradients, or container classes based on the dominant category output by HarmonyEngine.
requirements: Use tailwind-style classes to switch theme via `themeColor`
Ensure fallback/default class is applied if no dominant
Create optional overlays (e.g., SVG pattern or symbolic gradient)
Theme should sync with chart + HarmonyInsight components
